emailDialog.title: Your email
emailDialog.message: Please enter your email, we will send you a login link.

logIn.waitingLoginMessage: Please login yourself in the opened window. Do not close the application.
logIn.waitingConfirmationMessage: We have sent a confirmation link by email. Please click on it to continue. Do not close the application.
logIn.successNeedConfirmation: Success ! You will receive a confirmation email soon. Please click on the link on this device in order to log in.

unlinkConfirmationDialog.title: Unlink provider
unlinkConfirmationDialog.message: Are you sure you want to unlink this authentication provider from your account ?

deleteConfirmationDialog.title: Delete account
deleteConfirmationDialog.message: Do you really want to delete your account ? Note that, because it is a sensitive action, we require you to reauthenticate before proceeding.

email.title: Email
email.subtitle: Use your email to login. No password required, a confirmation link will be sent.

google.subtitle: Sign in with your Google account.
